body.name: Transformers Toys Generations War for Cybertron: Kingdom Leader WFC-K28 Galvatron Action Figure - Kids Ages 8 and Up, 7.5-inch
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 17 hrs 42 mins
features: DISCOVER KINGDOM: Worlds collide when the Maximals and Predacons join the fight, coming together with the Autobots and Decepticons in an epic battle that will alter their destiny forever
G1-INSPIRED ALT MODE: G1-inspired toy converts into Galactic cannon mode in 33 steps
CLASSIC G1 ACCESSORIES: Classic G1-inspired Particle Beam cannon and 2 side cannon accessories that attach in both modes. Also comes with a Matrix of Leadership on a chain that the figure can wear

GOLDEN DISK CARDS REVEAL POSSIBLE DESTINIES: Includes a Golden Disk card that reveals a possible destiny of a key character. Collect other Kingdom figures to reveal all 3 alternate destiny variants for each character! (Each sold separately. Subject to availability)
body.description: Beastify the battlefield! Worlds collide when the Maximals and Predacons join the fight, coming together with the Autobots and Decepticons in an epic battle that will alter their destiny forever. Behold, Galvatron! This G1-inspired toy converts into Galactic cannon mode in 33 steps and comes with Particle Beam cannon and 2 side cannon accessories that attach in both modes. The Matrix of Leadership accessory can hang around the Galvatron figure’s neck as it did in the 1986 film, The Transformers: The Movie. Includes a Golden Disk card that reveals a possible destiny of a key character. Collect other Kingdom figures to reveal all 3 alternate destiny variants for each character! (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.) Transformers and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.8 4.8 out of 5 stars 924 ratings 4.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time and in good shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars “Uh…what’d he say his name was?”
reviews.reviewText: This is easily the best Galvatron yet in my opinion. Fantastic sculpting, remarkable engineering, great articulation, this figure really is something special. A must have for fans of Transformers, especially fans of classic G1 era characters. Like much of the Siege/Earthrise/Kingdom line, this is Masterpiece level engineering at a (roughly) fifty dollar price point.Good accessories too. Galvatron comes packaged with the Autobot Matrix of Leadership on a chain that the figure can wear in both robot and laser cannon mode, as well as a pair of rifles that are the same shape as the ship Unicron gave his new minions in the ‘86 movie.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best version we’ve got
reviews.reviewText: This is the best Hasbro version of Galvatron yet! However, there are some flaws. Many of these have misassembled shoulders. Also, it’s priced as a $50 toy, but really it’s about a $30-$35 toy. They throw in some extraneous accessories, but they are cheaply made and barely interact with the figure. Also, the battle damage paint should have been skipped in favor of a more detailed paint scheme.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More accurate than the Titans Return Galvatron.
reviews.reviewText: It's nice to see Hasbro finally allow an animation-accurate toy for Galvatron (and back into space cannon alt mode!). The drawbacks of the Titans Return figure were the excessively massive cannon on his arm and.......the very ugly head (with the crown motif held on by a post), but this has been changed with the WFC: Kingdom Galvatron.With them moving towards these animation accurate figures, to match what Takara's been doing for years, let's hope that the next change we'll get will let all figures have hands that can open and close, instead of the standard closed fist with a hole in the center. Otherwise, this is a very great Galvatron figure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great looking Galvatron. The alt-mode, the chain matrix, and the general look makes it the best movie-like version available. Hopefully one day there'll be a materpiece but for something toy sized, it is the best out there currently. The tiny guns resemble his original ship. Only complaint is that Galvatron shouldn't be battle damaged. He's newly created so his toy should reflect his pristine condition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loving it. Great add to my collection.
reviews.reviewText: I happy to have got this. I miss having one years ago so having this works for me. I just wish it had lights like the G1 Did. But all in all I'm happy. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this figure it so well detailed and comes with so many accessories so that you can pose him in really cool poses just a little difficult to transform

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Más o menos

reviews.reviewText: I looked everywhere for this item from my son's list and he was thrilled to receive it!

Es una excelente representación del personaje, muy buenos tanto el modo robot como el modo alterno. Tiene un problema de ensamblaje en los hombros como muchos otros ejemplares, sin embargo no es nada del otro mundo y no debe ser un decremento a la hora de comprar, además que realmente no afecta en absolutamente nada fuera de un ligero detalle estético y un par de movimientos extra a la hora de transformar

Dies richtet sich nicht gegen Amazon, sondern gegen Hasbro.Seit Monaten ist bekannt, dass die Figur ,werksseitig falsch zusammen gebaut wurde, kann ja schon mal passieren, aber wenn das Monate später noch passiert, ist der Kunde wohl irrelevant.Die Figur am sich, ist gut(nur etwas klein), jetzt kann man sich überlegen ob man ihn repariert und Gefahr läuft ihn kaputt zu machen, oder ob man damit leben kann.
Product exactly as stated and in perfect condition. Definitely would recommend to any Transformers fan.
Great toy! Arrived just in time for Kingdom’s debut!!
